amendment.description: Amendment allocates 116-109 to allocate an additional $5 million to the Secretary's Minority AIDS Initiative Fund (SMAIF).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to allocate an additional $5 million to the Secretary's Minority AIDS Initiative Fund (SMAIF).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mucarsel-Powell amendment (A065) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 138 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mucarsel-Powell amendment (A065) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 138 (Roll no. 314).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A065) offered by Ms. Mucarsel-Powell.
